DOC.brief_summary: The objective study compare pharmacokinetics single oral administration YH4808 Diclofenac separately versus coadministration YH4808 Diclofenac healthy male volunteer
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetic Drug Interaction Between YH4808 Diclofenac
